com.madrobot.graphics.bitmap

Class ShapeTransformFilters

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.madrobot.graphics.bitmap.TransformFilters
      • com.madrobot.graphics.bitmap.ShapeTransformFilters

  • public class ShapeTransformFilters
extends TransformFilters
    Filters that transform the shape of the bitmap

    Rotate
    Rotation with the angle of 2.

    Author:
    elton.stephen.kent

    • Method Detail

      • twirl

        public static Bitmap twirl(Bitmap bitmap,
           float centreX,
           float centreY,
           float angle,
           float radius,
           int edgeAction,
           Config outputConfig)
        Create a twirl effect .
        Parameters:
        bitmap -
        centreX - the X coordinate of the twirl effect. the coordinates are represented as a float. for instance 0.5 represents the centre of the bitmap.
        centreY - the Y coordinate of the twirl effect. the coordinates are represented as a float. for instance 0.5 represents the centre of the bitmap
        angle - can be anything between -710 to 720. negative angles are used for clockwise twirl rotation.
        radius - of the twirl
        edgeAction - for the effect. TransformFilters.EDGE_ACTION_CLAMP, TransformFilters.EDGE_ACTION_RGB_CLAMP, TransformFilters.EDGE_ACTION_WRAP and TransformFilters.EDGE_ACTION_ZERO. recommended: TransformFilters.EDGE_ACTION_CLAMP
        outputConfig -
        Returns:

      • rotate

        public static Bitmap rotate(Bitmap src,
            float angle,
            boolean resize,
            int edgeAction,
            Bitmap.Config outputConfig)
        Rotate the bitmap by the given angle
        Parameters:
        src -
        angle -
        resize - allow resizing of the bitmap
        edgeAction - recommended : TransformFilters.EDGE_ACTION_RGB_CLAMP
        outputConfig -
        Returns:
